√kṛ3 'commemorate'

present: cakránt?  

aorist: [4.] akārṣam   -- [5.] akāriṣam  ákārīt  

secondary: intensive: carkarmi  carkṛdhi etc.  carkirāma  carkiran  cárkṛṣe (3s.)  

derivatives: kārá  kārín RV.  kārú V.  kīrí  -ín RV.  kīrtí V.+  -keru RV.  carkṛtí RV.  carkṛ́tya V.  

cakránt is anomalous and altogether questionable.
